context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz should do is to
generation: seek help from both public and private resources
look for resources to financially support her medication
explore different options such as seeking financial assistance or exploring cheaper alternatives to the medication
consult with her doctor about possible alternatives or generic versions of the medication that could be cheaper
explore all potential financial assistance options

consult with his wife's doctor or pharmacist about possible alternatives or generics for the medication, apply for patient assistance programs that help cover the cost of prescription medications, or explore fundraising options such as starting a GoFundMe campaign or seeking financial help from community organizations, friends and family
seek help from their local community
consult with her doctor or pharmacist regarding any potential alternative medications or treatments that may be more affordable
explore all possible options to obtain the medication
explore different financial options to afford the medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service in order to reach the airport on time
call a taxi, Uber, or any other available form of public transportation immediately to help him reach the airport on time
call a taxi, Uber or any other car service to get him to the airport as soon as possible while arranging for his car to be towed or sharing his location with a friend who can assist with the car
call for a cab or use a ride sharing app like Uber or Lyft immediately to get a ride to the airport
call a taxi or a ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft
call for road assistance or a tow truck service to fix his car or to tow it, and then order a cab, Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport as soon as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or any other form of quick transportation service to get him to the airport as soon as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or a friend to quickly get him to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or serviced later
call a taxi, ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft, or a friend immediately to pick him up
call for a taxi, Uber, or other immediate transportation service to get him to the airport

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: retrace the day's transactions to try and pinpoint where the discrepancy might have occurred
check the security cameras to see if he possibly overlooked a theft
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the owner and request for an investigation to be done
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor
check the security cameras or ask any coworkers if they noticed any irregularities during the day
thoroughly check the whole area including drawers, floors, or other possible places where the money could have been misplaced
check the surveillance cameras if available
check the security cameras to see if there's footage of any potential theft or miscounting
review security camera footage, if available, to see if he can identify how and when the money went missing
inform his supervisor or the owner of the business right away about the missing funds, explaining the situation in detail

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: stay put and try to create a visible signal for rescuers such as a smoke signal or brightly colored flag or marker
stay put and not wander farther
find a way to signal for help
stay put and try to create a shelter to keep warm
stay put in a safe location
stay at a single place, if it's safe, and wait for help
immediately find a way to signal for help

stay calm and stay put
stay put until help arrives
